item.title: [Template] Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways. æ¸¬è©¦ä¸­æ–‡ The <code>emojify</code> function can be called directly in templates or Inline Shortcodes . To enable emoji globally, set enableEmoji to true in your site’s configuration and then you can type emoji shorthand codes directly in content files; e.g. ðŸ™ˆ :see_no_evil: ðŸ™‰ :hear_no_evil: ðŸ™Š :speak_no_evil: The Emoji cheat sheet is a useful reference for emoji shorthand codes.
